					<script type="text/javascript">
			var src ="//in.bmscdn.com/iedb/movies/images/website/banner/large/the-lion-king-2019-et00089130-23-11-2018-01-42-40.jpg", imgSrc = "//in.bmscdn.com/iedb/movies/images/website/poster/large/the-lion-king-2019-et00089130-23-11-2018-01-42-40.jpg";			function fnChangeUrl(pathName) {
				try {
					var myURL = window.location.pathname.substr(0, window.location.pathname.indexOf("movies"));
					window.location = myURL+"movies/"+pathName;
				} catch(e) {
					BMS.Misc.fnErr({ fnName : "fnChangeUrl", err : e });
				}
			}

                                                    <div class="__heading">SYNOPSIS</div>
                            <div class="synopsis">
                               <blockquote cite="http://in.bookmyshow.com/movies/the-lion-king/ET00089130">
									"The Lion King" journeys to the African savanna where a future king must overcome betrayal and tragedy to assume his rightful place on Pride Rock.								</blockquote>

class="__timestamp">24/7/19</span>									  </span></div><div class="__reviewer-text">The movie is pretty much like the original animated movie. Where the similarity in the plot takes away any suspense, the songs throw you back to your childhood, when 'Akuna Matata' became your Mantra.
It's amazing to see your beloved characters in love action. I thought its impossible for live action movie to be as funny as animated, but I stand corrected. I realize it's possible to love Timon and Pumba more.
The shots of the Serengeti were breathtaking, I would go again just for them.</div></div></div><div class="mv-synopsis-review"><div class="__reviewer-face"><div class="wow __reviewer-image-area" 	<span class="__timestamp">19/7/19</span>									  </span></div><div class="__reviewer-text">The best visual and audio treat in a very long time, brought together in a story many of us grew up with. By largely keeping the soundtrack and story true to the original the magic has been retained and then exponentially enhanced by the awesome true to life 3D rendering and magnificent casting for the vistas and characters respectively. I went to the movie expecting to be charmed and found myself cheering and laughing and thoroughly enjoying this absolutely terrific treat from Disney along with the kids and other adults in the theater! I recommend this one!!!</div></div></div><div class="mv-synopsis-review"><div class="__reviewer-face"><div class="wow __reviewer-image-area" style="visibility: visible;"><img 	<span class="__timestamp">19/7/19</span>									  </span></div><div class="__reviewer-text">movie is fantastic.
there is humor,there is emotion,VFX and visuals were top notch.
There are many goops elevations which make you go gaaga.the bond between simba and mufasa is highly emotional and inspiring.
A Perfect Must watch for the weekend.
Do watch in your own language since the dubbing is also too good #HakunaMatata</div></div></div><div class="mv-synopsis-review"><div class="__reviewer-face"><div class="wow __reviewer-image-area" 	<div class="__reviewer-comment" itemprop="review" itemscope="" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review">
	<div class="__reviewer-name-rate">
		<span class="__reviewer-left"><span id="critic_" itemprop="author">Hindustan Times</span>
		<meta itemprop="name" content="The Lion King">
		<span class="__review-rate ">
			<!-- <span></span> -->

	<div class="__reviewer-comment" itemprop="review" itemscope="" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review">
	<div class="__reviewer-name-rate">
		<span class="__reviewer-left"><span id="critic_" itemprop="author">News 18</span>
		<meta itemprop="name" content="The Lion King">
		<span class="__review-rate ">
			<!-- <span></span> -->

		<div id="criticReview_" class="__reviewer-text">
			<span itemprop="description">`The Lion King` (2019) is certainly worth a watch for its gorgeous visuals and technical genius and ones catching it in Hindi will have Shah Rukh Khan and Aryan Khan adding their spark.</span>
			<a href="https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/hindi/movie-reviews/the-lion-king/movie-review/70240680.cms" class="__read-review-link" target="_blank">...Read full review</a>

	<div class="__reviewer-comment" itemprop="review" itemscope="" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review">
	<div class="__reviewer-name-rate">
		<span class="__reviewer-left"><span id="critic_" itemprop="author">The Indian Express</span>
		<meta itemprop="name" content="The Lion King">
		<span class="__review-rate ">
			<!-- <span></span> -->

			<span itemprop="description">In The Lion King, the technology Jon Favreau wields has got another update, to deliver every single, wind-blown hair in the beautiful manes of Simba and Mufasa.</span>

	<div class="__reviewer-comment" itemprop="review" itemscope="" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review">
	<div class="__reviewer-name-rate">
		<span class="__reviewer-left"><span id="critic_" itemprop="author">Times Now</span>
		<meta itemprop="name" content="The Lion King">
		<span class="__review-rate ">
			<!-- <span></span> -->

		<div id="criticReview_" class="__reviewer-text">
			<span itemprop="description">While it is visually pleasing, director Jon Favreau`s all-new adaption does not carry near as much weight as the original classic.</span>
			<a href="https://www.deccanchronicle.com/entertainment/movie-reviews/170719/the-lion-king-movie-review-despite-great-potential-it-falls-disappoi.html" class="__read-review-link" target="_blank">...Read full review</a>

	<div class="__reviewer-comment" itemprop="review" itemscope="" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review">
	<div class="__reviewer-name-rate">
		<span class="__reviewer-left"><span id="critic_" itemprop="author">Times of India</span>
		<meta itemprop="name" content="The Lion King">
		<span class="__review-rate ">
			<!-- <span></span> -->

<script type="text/javascript">
  var clevertap = {event:[], profile:[], account:[], onUserLogin:[], notifications:[]};
  // wizrocket.account.push({"id":"RK6-Z85-W44Z"});
      clevertap.account.push({"id": "RK4-47R-98KZ"});
  
  (function () {
     var wzrk = document.createElement('script');
     wzrk.type = 'text/javascript';
     wzrk.async = true;
     wzrk.src = ('https:' == document.location.protocol ? 'https://d2r1yp2w7bby2u.cloudfront.net' : 'http://static.clevertap.com') + '/js/a.js';
     var s = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
     s.parentNode.insertBefore(wzrk, s);
  })();
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
  if ( BMS.Storage.get({name:"ld", "key":"MEMBERID", storage: "C"}) != "" ) {
    if (typeof(clevertap) !== "undefined") {
      clevertap.profile.push({
        "Site": {
          "Identity" : BMS.Storage.get({name:"ld", "key":"MEMBERID", storage: "C"}),
          "Email" : BMS.Storage.get({name:"ld", "key":"MEMBEREMAIL", storage: "C"}),
          "Phone" : "+91" + $.trim(BMS.Storage.get({name:"ld", "key":"MOBILE", storage: "C"})),
          "App Language" : $("#dLangWrap [data-val='" + (BMS.Storage.get({ name: "lang", storage: "C" }) || "eng") + "']").attr("data-name")
        }
      });
    }
  }
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
  jQuery(document).ready(function() {
    if(pageName != 'buytickets') { //Ali added this to avoid freeze on render for IE
      svg4everybody();
    }

    window.setTimeout(function() {

      //Add condtion for checking if user has selected the region
      if(BMS.Storage.isset({name:'Rgn'})) {
        BMS.Misc.fnPushNotificationsFromClevertap();
      }
    }, 5000); //Execute after 5000 ms

  });
</script>

        	var infoClickHandler = function () {
        		var event_code = $(this).attr("data-id");
        		var event_title = $(this).attr("data-event-title");
        		var position = $(this).attr("data-position");

				BMS.Misc.fnPushEventDataToAnalytics(["GA"], "", {}, {
					'event': 'bms_related_movie_info',
					'movie_id': event_code,
					'position': position,
					'movie_name':event_title
				});

					'position': position,
					'movie_name': event_title
				});
